title: More Companies Defect From Facebook’s Libra Project
text:
The list of companies that are dropping out of the consortium expected to govern Facebook’s Libra digital currency is growing. eBay, the privately held payments business Stripe, Visa, and Mastercard have all left the Libra Association.

In statements to Barron’s, Stripe and eBay praised the concept behind Libra—making online commerce more accessible—but said they have decided not to be part of the founding group of association members. “We will follow its progress closely and remain open to working with the Libra Association...
description: EBay and the privately held payments business Stripe have both left the Libra Association, the companies said.
